sect1.title: Assigning Tickets
sect1.para: When you are ready to start working on an issue that is in Trac, step one is to assign it to yourself. This informs all the editors that you are working on the issue.

listitem.para: Go to the isssue you want to work on.
Select the Accept ticket radio button.
Click on the Submit changes button.
While working on the issue, sometimes you may want to add comments to it. Feel free to do so.
